author: Matthew Beedham
title: Coronavirus leads to global decrease in oil demand, air quality is on the up
description: With various lockdown and quarantine policies in place across the world to stem the spread of coronavirus, people are driving a lot less. This is having a positive effect on air quality in cities, but it’s cause for concern for petrol stations the world over.…
content: With various lockdown and quarantine policies in place across the world to stem the spread of coronavirus, people are driving a lot less. This is having a positive effect on air quality in cities, but its cause for concern for petrol stations the world over.… [+3397 chars]
